ModMetaData.name: Amazons
ModMetaData.author: WebSlug
ModMetaData.description:
<size=18><color=#87CEFA>Description</color></size> Adds a new potential ally or enemy faction on the map called the Amazons.
<size=18><color=#87CEFA>Objective</color></size> Can you defeat the female supremacist horde of Amazon warriors who are determined to conquer the planet?
<size=18><color=#87CEFA>Requirements</color></size> Requires the Royalty and Idealogy DLC to function.
<size=18><color=#87CEFA>Conflicts</color></size> None reported so far...
